CustomField.description: Apply DPD discount on the lines which are priced from PSP
CustomField.formula: ROUND(IF( TEXT(Apttus_Config2__ConfigurationId__r.Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.PRMDeal_Origination_Discount_Status__c)=="Approved with DOD" && NOT( Apttus_Config2__ConfigurationId__r.Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.NokiaCPQ_LEO_Discount__c) && TEXT(Apttus_Config2__ConfigurationId__r.Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.Account.Partner_Type__c) == "Distributor" && (Apttus_Config2__ConfigurationId__r.NokiaCPQ_ContractedPrice__c) > BLANKVALUE(Apttus_Config2__AdjustmentAmount__c,0) && CONTAINS(Name, 'Total (One Time)'), (Apttus_Config2__ConfigurationId__r.NokiaCPQ_ContractedPrice__c - BLANKVALUE(Apttus_Config2__AdjustmentAmount__c,0) ) * Apttus_Config2__ConfigurationId__r.Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.NokiaCPQ_DPD_Per__c , 0),2)
CustomField.label: DPD
